TEXT.TITLE: MOORE-MCCORMACK <MMR> COMPLETES UNIT SALE
TEXT.BODY: Moore McCormack Resources Inc said it has completed the previously-announced sale of its Interlake Steamship Co and Moore McCormack Bulk Transport Inc Great Lakes and ocean bulk shipping units to James R. Barker. The company said president Paul Tregurtha has succeeded Barker as chairman and chief executive officer of Moore McCormack. Reuter
